events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorised under engineering roles, specifically software development, based on your experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps.
The initial screening has been completed, and the feedback from our HR team was very positive regarding your technical skills.
You have responded enthusiastically to the screening outcome and confirmed your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM. The panel will evaluate your developer and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview went well, with strong feedback on your software engineering expertise and coding proficiency.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 17th at 3 PM to discuss cultural fit and employment terms.
Your HR interview was successful, and the team is impressed with your communication skills and enthusiasm for the role.
An employment offer has been proposed to you, including a competitive salary and benefits package for the engineering position.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer for the software engineer role, and we are thrilled to welcome you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started, including setting up access to development tools and team introductions.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful integration into our engineering team.
